summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 11 priority open recommendations for U.S. Department of Agriculture as of April 2019. For example, we recommended that USDA coordinate...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: U.S. Department of Agriculture
